title: How to easily manage individual app notifications in Android
content:
Being able to manage and customize your notifications on a device is a key part of being able to enjoy the experience. On Android, you have a few different options for managing notifications to fit your needs. This guide will walk you through how you can get those notifications in check.

The post How to easily manage individual app notifications in Android appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Notifications can get messy. This guide will help you get notifications on Android under control by managing them in settings.
